data.text: We had a fantastic business trip experience at the Auris Boutique Hotel (1BHK) in Al Barsha, Dubai from Feb 26th to March 2nd, 2024. The impeccably decorated room with a king-size bed exceeded expectations, and the kitchen offered convenient dining options. Mr. Tazul's exceptional service truly impressed us. The location, near the metro and walking distance to restaurants and the Mall of Emirates, was perfect. Thank you for making our trip memorable!
data.title: Fantastic business trip experience at the Auris Boutique Hotel (1BHK) in Al Barsha, Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Many thanks for choosing to stay at Auris Boutique Hotel Apartments and endorsing the hotel on Trip Advisor.

I am glad to know that you enjoyed your stay at the hotel. Mr. Tazul and other team members are happy to read your kind words of appreciation which will certainly encourage them to continue to walk that extra mile to delight all our guests. 

Guest reviews are imperative in shaping our continuous growth and it is our sincere endeavor to offer our patrons with an exquisite stay. As well your suggestions will be added to consideration for service improvements.

The team and I, look forward to welcoming you back hoping you return soon!
owner_response.author: Gurpreet Singh

data.text: From the time I booked the hotel, I was treated well and given all help with my stay at the hotel, reception staff was excellent specially Ms. Dilushika was very friendly and very professional she attended to us and gave all support  in booking rooms , our cabs for business meetings etc , room service was good, the staff at the Gym was very friendly . Easy access to shopping mall and good restaurants. Not too crowded. Would recommend this place to anyone .
data.title: Great experience at Auris , rooms are very clean, spacious, close to shopping malls , close to good restaurants etc

data.text: Overall, my stay was excellent. Praveen, Feroz at the front desk were super helpful and Tajul from the house keeping was very responsive and resourceful. Rest others were also very friendly and helpful. I stayed in a 1 BHK apartment which had good kitchen facility but the utensils can be of a good standard as it is used to the core. Not really great for people who want to cook daily. Rest all was excellent. Will come and stay again next time.
data.title: Excellent Stay and Great People

data.text: First let me thank the front office and reservation team,Dilushika , Arathi , Praveen, Feroz,  Roshith 😊🙏, Also Tajul in housekeeping, they did a wonderful job in servicing my requests and were always helpful and smiling. As a hotel itself it's in a great location and walking distance to the mall, rooms need a bit of refurbishment but it has everything you need in case you want to stay more than 3 days. Thank you as well for the management who listened and assisted in all matters.
data.title: Thank you team

data.text: Amazing hotel and staff. Makes u feel at home and not at all uncomfortable. Praveen and Dilushika are just stars and Aarthi at the reception is great too. Always helpful and kind is what makes a hotel a home. The room was amazing and just very cozy
data.title: Must visit!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at our property.

It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. I will share your comments with our team (Mr. Praveen, Ms. Dilushika, Ms. Aarthi). I am sure that this feedback will serve as an encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services.

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be as pleasant as the previous one.
owner_response.author: Gurpreet Singh
